pullrequest.title: Adding xacro parameter to specify task name in plugin

content.raw:
I’ll go with whatever you decide, but my opinion is that in this case, reluctantly for the reasons you mention, we should change the documentation so it says `dock` because it is too confusing to have our docking task that involves no scanning be called `scan`.

‌
content.html:
I’ll go with whatever you decide, but my opinion is that in this case, reluctantly for the reasons you mention, we should change the documentation so it says dock because it is too confusing to have our docking task that involves no scanning be called scan.

‌
